channel.title: Help with dieing and not losing items?
channel.description: Ok,well i'm working on adding a fully working duel arena to my server,i got the tele to duel arena down,and how to get into the arena,only problem is when you die you lose your items,anyone know a code that lets you keep your items,and also if you know a code i could use to let the people on my server stake.ANY help will be greatly appericated.
